title: Python Programming
content: Python is a great programming language for web development, data analysis, and automation.

title: Solr Search Engine
content: Solr is an open-source search platform for building search applications.

title: FastAPI and Solr Integration
content: FastAPI can be used to create APIs that connect to Solr and perform full-text searches.

title: Python for Data Science
content: Python offers robust libraries such as NumPy, pandas, and Matplotlib for data manipulation, analysis, and visualization.

title: Django Web Framework
content: Django is a high-level Python framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.
